column2: This was the only Castle Lego set I owned as a child. I have to say it was one of my all time favourite lego sets that I had. I spent countless hours playing with these guys. I would build my own castles with my general Lego set blocks I had. I always wanted the the big castle set but it was way too expensive, so, these guys were it.
Recently, I opened up my old Lego box that I'd kept all these years. I found after 30 years, I still had the majority of the pieces that came with this set. Fun stuff.

column3: It had six minifigs and lots of cool things for them such as the swords, shields, etc.
One couldn't really build much with it. One really needed some supporting Lego to go with it.

column2: This set was great for a child to play with Lego castle for only a few dollars. It was a great deal for the money. Something a child could buy with his own pocket money.
